channel.title: Client crashes down
channel.description: I'm using Boxingscape as source, and also using Boxingscape's client. I've made few changes there (changing IP etc.). Why does the client crash after like 10 seconds after I log in? It doesn't crash, when I'm not moving. I can spawn items. I can change my account's rights etc. I can spawn npc's. It just says ; ClientHandler : Client XXXXX disconnected. Pictures needed? I'll get 'em if you want to.

item.title: Client crashes down
item.dc:creator: @mossep mossep
item.description:
@mossep wrote:

[quote=“Awesomeishness, post:2, topic:359252”]This goes in Client Help.

But I think I got the same error too, but with different clients and stuff.

Like, everytime I do an action, Move, Talk to an npc, Etc, etc, etc.

The client just closes.[/quote]

Exactly the problem I have. Help would be nice… :S

Read full topic
